channel.title: New skill/skill name changing and Item making?
channel.description:
1. how do i change the name of ... lets say farming... ?
2. and can i make and new object that lets say looks like a brass key and have the same options like a brass key?
3. can i add new options to objects npc's and items... and if yes. how do i make an attack option on like santa work?
ty if you help ;)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 04, 2008, 07:17:44 AM[/size][hr]help :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 05, 2008, 07:01:23 AM[/size][hr]bump ;)
